items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and elegant
items.body: 5’2 108lbs ordered a small and fit perfectly. Comfortable, elegant, and well made for price. Lace was not itchy what’s so ever and the velvet helped to keep you warm. Read more
items.author: MB

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this dress and so does my husband!
items.body: I’m 5’4” and 138 pounds and ordered a large. This dress fit perfectly. It has some stretch to it so it’s very comfortable. The lace is not itchy at all. I’m ver impressed with the quality, especially for the price. I can’t wait to wear it on New Year’s Eve! Read more
items.author: Mrs. Winkel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress
items.body: Its really cute, exactly as shown but oh my the material makes me cringe lol the velvet material ahhh. Thats just how I've always been with that type of material but i can deal with it haha. Some may find the lacey parts scratchy but its fine for me. I sized up just incase. Still fits fine. Read more
items.author: Shanese

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the $
items.body: Comfortable and very elegant for the evening. Read more
items.author: dgray

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and fun
items.body: Velvet was soft. Dress is fun and nice quality. Lace back is nice as well. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars New favorite dress
items.body: Absolutely adore this dress. I'm usually not a fan of high low cut dresses but this one does it perfectly. The lace on the arms isn't too tight and not scratchy at all, the velvet is sooo soft and comfy with a nice thickness. Read more
items.author: Candi Megumi

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
